name: Beatroot (P3ngui, Serrion1321, G0vinda)
description:
The Game:
A rhythm-based 2D-Platformer/ Rhythm-Game. You are a Beetroot that has to escape from a farm that got infected by rotten Beetroot-Zombies! Your very special skill is your groove, because you are not an ordinary beetroot. You are a Beatroot!

 Game created at GGJ 2023.

Controls for Controller:
Start-Button: Restarts Game
X-Button:       Dash (Blue Drumstick-Icon)
A-Button:      Jump (Green Keyboard-Icon)

Controls for Keyboard:
A:                   Restarts Game
D:                   Dash (Blue Drumstick-Icon)
Spacebar:      Jump (Green Keyboard-Icon)

Team:
Kevin         (programmer)
Freddie      (programmer)
Alex           (art, animation)
Johannes  (music, sounddesign)
